alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Camden; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Atlantic, southwestern Ocean, southern Camden, northeastern Gloucester and southern Burlington Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 845 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sicklerville, or 16 miles north of Vineland, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lindenwold, Hammonton, Clayton, Berlin, Tabernacle, Shamong, Egg Harbor City, Tuckerton, Chesilhurst, Sicklerville, Atsion, Wading River, Warren Grove, Chatsworth, Atco, Victory Lakes, Wharton State Forest, Williamstown, Bass River State Forest and Batsto. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 51 and 59. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 28 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Camden; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington
